md:
giải nghĩa từ "spreads" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Spreads (verb):
	+ Meaning: to spread or distribute something over a wide area or to many people.
	+ Vietnamese: lan truyền, phân phối, trải rộng.
	+ Example sentence: The company spreads its products to many countries around the world.
	+ Related words: distribute, disseminate, scatter, broadcast.
	+ Antonyms: concentrates, gathers, collects.

* Spreads (noun):
	+ Meaning: a wide area or range of something.
	+ Vietnamese: phạm vi, khu vực, vùng rộng.
	+ Example sentence: The spreads of the company's influence are vast and far-reaching.
	+ Related words: range, scope, area, extent.
	+ Antonyms: limits, boundaries, confines.

* Spreads (finance):
	+ Meaning: the difference between the bid and ask prices of a security.
	+ Vietnamese: chênh lệch giá, khoảng cách giá.
	+ Example sentence: The spreads on this stock are very high, making it a risky investment.
	+ Related words: bid-ask spread, price difference, margin.
	+ Antonyms: none.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "spreads" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  • Spreads (verb):

    • Example sentence: The company spreads its products to many countries around the world.

  • Spreads (noun):

    • Meaning: a wide area or range of something.
    • Vietnamese: phạm vi, khu vực, vùng rộng.
    • Example sentence: The spreads of the company's influence are vast and far-reaching.
    • Related words: range, scope, area, extent.
    • Antonyms: limits, boundaries, confines.

  • Spreads (finance):

    • Meaning: the difference between the bid and ask prices of a security.
    • Vietnamese: chênh lệch giá, khoảng cách giá.
    • Example sentence: The spreads on this stock are very high, making it a risky investment.
    • Related words: bid-ask spread, price difference, margin.
    • Antonyms: none.
